doc:
Mike Von Erich https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mike_Von_Erich 0 Michael Brett Adkisson (March 2, 1964 – April 12, 1987) was an American professional wrestler under the ring name Mike Von Erich. His four brothers, David, Kerry, Kevin and Chris, also wrestled. He was the son of longtime Texas wrestler and wrestling promoter Fritz Von Erich and a member of the Von Erich family. Michael_Brett_Adkisson ( March_2_,_1964 – April_12_,_1987 ) was an_American_professional_wrestler under the_ring_name_Mike_Von_Erich . His_four_brothers , David , Kerry , Kevin_and_Chris , also wrestled . He was the_son of longtime_Texas_wrestler_and_wrestling_promoter_Fritz_Von_Erich and a_member of the_Von_Erich_family .
